verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* departing \w from|strong="H5265"\w* thence \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* leadeth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Red \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* compassed \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w You|strong="H0853"\w* \w have|strong="H6437"\w* compassed \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* long \w enough|strong="H7227"\w*: \w go|strong="H5437"\w* \w toward|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* dwelling \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee, knoweth thy journey, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast passed \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast wanted \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Fight|strong="H4421"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* Emims \w first|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, \w a|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w strong|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w so|strong="H3427"\w* \w tall|strong="H7311"\w*, \w that|strong="H1419"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* race \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Enacims,

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w esteemed|strong="H2803"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* giants, \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* sons \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Enacims. \w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4125"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* Emims.

Thou shalt \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* city named \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou comest nigh \w the|strong="H3588"\w* frontiers \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w take|strong="H5414"\w* heed thou fight \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* once move \w to|strong="H5414"\w* battle: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* Hevites also, \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Haserim \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, \w were|strong="H3427"\w* expelled \w by|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Cappadocians: \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Cappadocia, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H8478"\w* \w stead|strong="H8478"\w*.
